text.section: The Secretary shall, in accordance with the State plan established under Subtitle 3 of this title, determine the need, if any, for one or more public group homes for individuals with developmental disability in each county or multicounty region of the State.
The part of the State plan that relates to the need for public group homes shall be sent to each county.
